arguments.description: structure from which to start search. This parameter requires an object, not a name of an object.
arguments.name: Top

arguments.description:
- one (default): function returns one matching key
- all: function returns all matching keys
arguments.name: Scope

description:
Searches recursively through a substructure of nested arrays,
        structures, and other elements for structures with values that
        match the search key in the value parameter.
name: structfindvalue
